native.query:
SELECT 
    lp.state_name AS "State Name",
    COUNT(DISTINCT lp.created_by) AS "Total Projects Count",
    COUNT(CASE WHEN lp.status = 'started' THEN 1 END) AS "Total Projects Initiated",
    COUNT(CASE WHEN lp.status = 'inProgress' THEN 1 END) AS "Total Projects In-Progress",
    COUNT(CASE WHEN lp.status = 'submitted' THEN 1 END) AS "Total Projects Submitted",
    ldu.dashboard_url As "Dashboard URL"
FROM 
    ${config.projects} lp
JOIN 
    ${config.dashboard_url} ldu
    ON lp.state_id = ldu.entity_id
WHERE 
    lp.state_id IS NOT NULL
    AND lp.created_by IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 
    lp.state_name, ldu.dashboard_url
ORDER BY 
    "Total Projects Count" DESC;
